{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ruckus Wireless |model=ZoneFlex 7982 |revision=(ZF7982) |series=N900 |asin=B0092SOFRA |fcc_date=03/04/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=S9G-MPE2N33A,S9G-MPE5N33A |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Ruckus Wireless MPE2N33A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Ruckus Wireless MPE5N33A |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11n Three-Stream Dual Band Wireless Access Point}} :[http://www.ruckuswireless.com/products/zoneflex-indoor/7982 Product page] {{•}} [http://c541678.r78.cf2.rackcdn.com/datasheets/ds-zoneflex-7982.pdf Datasheet]
===Specifications=== *[[Ruckus Wireless MPE2N33A]] - 802.11bgn mini-PCI Express Radio Module :FCC ID: S9G-MPE2N33A (2012-03-04) • [[Atheros]] (3T3R 2.4GHz) *[[Ruckus Wireless MPE5N33A]] - 802.11an mini-PCI Express Radio Module :FCC ID: S9G-MPE5N33A (2012-03-08) • [[Atheros]] (3T3R 5GHz)
